drops_sequences:
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS account_num_seq CASCADE;
DROP SEQUENCE IF EXISTS partner_address_id CASCADE;
address:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS address
(
 address_id int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 address    varchar(300) NOT NULL,
 City       varchar(150) NOT NULL,
 Country    varchar(150) NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT pk_address PRIMARY KEY ( address_id )
);
general_ledger:
CREATE TABLE general_ledger
(
 ledger_id              int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 reporting_type         varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 reporting_level_first  varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 reporting_level_second varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 values bigint,
 CONSTRAINT pk_general_ledger PRIMARY KEY ( ledger_id )
);
partner:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner
(
 partner_id       int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 full_name        varchar(100) NOT NULL,
 address_id       int DEFAULT NEXTVAL ('partner_address_id'),
 sex              char(1) ,
 email            varchar(150) NOT NULL,
 cityzenship      varchar(150) NOT NULL,
 date_of_birth    date NOT NULL,
 mobile_num       varchar(100) NOT NULL,
 legal_status     varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 economic_sector  varchar(150) NULL,
 position         varchar(200) NULL,
 opening_date   date NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT pk_partner PRIMARY KEY ( partner_id ),
 CONSTRAINT fk_address FOREIGN KEY ( address_id ) REFERENCES address ( address_id )
);
CREATE INDEX FK_223 ON partner
(
 address_id
);
accounts:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS accounts
(
 account_id     SERIAL,
 account_number bigint DEFAULT NEXTVAL ('account_num_seq'),
 opening_date   date NOT NULL,
 ledger_id      int NOT NULL,
 partner_id     int NOT NULL,
 balance        bigint NOT NULL,
 currency       char(3) NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT pk_accounts PRIMARY KEY ( account_id ),
 CONSTRAINT fk_partner FOREIGN KEY ( partner_id ) REFERENCES partner ( partner_id ),
 CONSTRAINT FK_general_ledger FOREIGN KEY ( ledger_id ) REFERENCES general_ledger ( ledger_id )
);
CREATE INDEX FK_263 ON accounts
(
 partner_id
);
CREATE INDEX FK_338 ON accounts
(
 ledger_id
);
contracts:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS contracts
(
 contract_number int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 ledger_id            int NOT NULL,
 interest_rate        double precision NOT NULL,
 commission_rate      double precision NOT NULL,
 contract_date        date NOT NULL,
 redemption_date      date NOT NULL,
 contract_sum         bigint NOT NULL,
 current_balance      bigint NOT NULL,
 currency             char(3) NOT NULL,
 partner_id           int NOT NULL,
 contract_type        varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 number_of_payments   int NOT NULL,
 category varchar(50) NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT pk_contracts PRIMARY KEY ( contract_number ),
 CONSTRAINT fk_general_ledger FOREIGN KEY ( ledger_id ) REFERENCES general_ledger ( ledger_id ),
 CONSTRAINT fk_partner FOREIGN KEY ( partner_id ) REFERENCES partner ( partner_id )
);
CREATE INDEX FK_351 ON contracts
(
 ledger_id
);

CREATE INDEX fkIdx_150 ON contracts
(
 partner_iD
);
exchange_rates:
CREATE TABLE exchange_rates
(
 currency_id int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 currency CHAR(3) NOT NULL,
 exchange_rate double precision NOT NULL,
 start_date    date NOT NULL,
 end_date      date NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT pk_exchange_rates PRIMARY KEY ( currency_id )
);
transaction_log:
CREATE TABLE transaction_log
(
 log_id           int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 ledger_id_debit  int NOT NULL,
 ledger_id_credit int NOT NULL,
 contract_number  int NULL,
 transaction_type char(50) NOT NULL,
 transaction_sum  bigint NOT NULL,
 debit_account    bigint NOT NULL,
 credit_account   bigint NOT NULL,
 currency_id      int NOT NULL,
 currency         char(50) NOT NULL,
 "date"             date NOT NULL,
  status           char (15) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT PK_360 PRIMARY KEY ( log_id )
);
amortization_table:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS amortization_table
(
 amortization_table_id    int GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
 contract_number      int NOT NULL,
 payment_date         date NOT NULL,
 payment_sum          bigint NOT NULL,
 principal            bigint NOT NULL,
 interest             bigint NOT NULL,
 current_balance      bigint NOT NULL,
 cumulative_principal bigint NOT NULL,
 partner_id           int NOT NULL,
 currency             char(3) NULL,
contract_type        char(15) NOT NULL,
 category             char(15) NOT NULL,
 ledger_id            int NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT pk_amortization_table PRIMARY KEY (amortization_table_id),
 CONSTRAINT fk_contracts FOREIGN KEY ( contract_number ) REFERENCES contracts (contract_number )
 
);

CREATE INDEX FK_350 ON amortization_table
(
 contract_number
);
